title: can't play
body:
after selecting a hero i get stuck with the "reconnect" button after hitting it nothing happens.

anyone know a fix?

replies.body: That'll happen sometimes if your network has any kind of disconnection while in the lobby, causing you to lose your link with the lobby and the rest of the players. Using an ethernet connection may help, but I'd also be sure to try [**updating your firewall settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#wq3) in case they're blocking your access.
